Ebbro 44254 Nissan Skyline GT-R (BNCR33) HDF 1998 JGTC Series GT500 Class 12th Place S. Motoyama/T. Tsuchiya

Purchased: 2015
Manufacturer page: http://www.ebbro.jp/SHOP/44254.html

Satoshi Motoyama & Takeshi Tsuchiya raced for Autobacs Racing Team Aguri in the 1998 JGTC Series. Their best results were back-to-back 6th place finishes in round 5 at Twin Ring Motegi and round 6 at Mine Circuit, finishing 12th overall in the GT500 class. This is the High Down Force (HDF) version of the car used in multiple rounds through out the season. Motoyama would have much better luck in the future, winning the 2003, 2004 & 2008 GT500 class titles.
